storyInfo: For her liege, and for her companions aboard the ship and back home, Indra strives to learn when she should raise her fists, and when to let things go.

attributes.content: 8:27 A.M. \ Clear
Rhodes Island Landship, Training Grounds
You ready? Here I go!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Nice try, mate!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Who says good morning before they knock ya sideways? You're being daft!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Why don't you try me!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Your fist's hard as pillows, all floppy. I could bludgeon better with brown bread gone two days in the freezer.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Huff... you're clearly not as fast as me!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: ...Why can't I hit you?!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Keep trying! No use, mate!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Who taught you how to fight like this?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: My dad taught me... wrestling techniques... my dad's a really amazing policeman!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Eh? Dad this and dad that? Ya still a little kid then?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hah!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Okay, eyes on the prize! I'll find an opening!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: 'Ey, that one was gettin' somewhere!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Keep goin'! C'mon, let's go again!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: (I can't—I can't get away...)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: You attack with... such a crazy angle! What kind of style is that?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Eh? Style? I don't think about any style when I fight, mate!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: If you can harp on about your fighting, show some skill instead, why don't you! I wanna work up a sweat here, come on!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Getting faster—
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Too slow! Pick it up!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Heyah!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: (Ack, my eyes! That was an inch away! Too close!)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Huff... huff... hah...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (I don't even have the chance to hit back... and I took one right in the stomach...)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Weak! Flip me, this is weak!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hey. Oi, time out, you. You lookin' down on me or somethin'?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'm hittin' you serious here. Come on, my eye tells me you've got skills, but everything you do comes out all dawdlin'.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Listen, alright, you little tyke? Get your fist, from just now, and smash my nose in, alright? My nose, right here! See it? Just bump it, 'n rose-red'll come flyin' out!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I... ahhah...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: My dad said... my fist should only make enemies bleed...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Aaaauugh, you do my head in! Mate, that is ALL pointless right now!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It could be so bleedin' simple! A fight's just a fight! Why've ya gotta think so much?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Hah!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Well, alright. You stand up pretty good to a thumpin'.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You know if I smacked any normal tosser around a couple times, they'd have been cryin', beggin' me to forgive 'em by now?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I... I'm not gonna beg.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: You're insanely strong, but you can't... underestimate me.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Ey-hey, I like that. Gettin' interesting again.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Seein' as you ain't run, I'm gonna hurry up and let you—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: ...block my fist?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: What's this? Whip? Hey, not bad, you.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Jackie, head down. Get Lancet-2 to dress your wounds as a holdover, and then report to Medical.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But training's still...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: The morning training course will permit your absence. Extenuating circumstances. Don't expect this again.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Furthermore, remember this. Rhodes Island or no, training grounds are a battlefield, and you only face opponents, not friends. In front of the enemy, your lenience will be a weakness.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Next time you're beaten like this, I'll have to consider giving you supplementary courses.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Got it, Instructor!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Uh... Operator Indra, thank you for training with me today! Next time I'll put on a even better show!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Tch. Flippin' weak.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hold it there.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oi, you wanna go too? You look bang-up, I'd reckon.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'm not going to play about with you.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Play? You sayin' fightin's play? Oi, can I check a sec, yeah? Do you know how I got here?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Operator Indra, your current conduct is very juvenile, in my opinion.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You're no longer a student. You don't need me setting courses for you. But I'd still like to give you some suggestions.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Then first off—before you're properly prepared, you are not to step one foot on the training grounds again.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Huh? Why? That little rabbit told me if I wanted a fight, I could come here and all.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I am not going to waste time pointing out how many incorrect assumptions you've made in that one sentence.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Briefly, the training grounds are not a place to vent your private moods. Operators do not learn from one another with the goal of causing permanent harm to the other party.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Once you've gotten things straight, you can come back again. The new recruits very much need the genuine combat guidance your experience provides.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But for now, I would like you to leave.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Hmph. The whole lot here's just people who go on and on. Each one's more boring than the last.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Stuck in here every day without a fight's seriously killing me.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: What's the point of the food here? Meat 'n' potatoes are enough. Why d'you need all this variety? What's all the seasoning about? Gettin' sick of chewin' it, it's making my mouth go rotten!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: And this room! Metal plates cold as a fridge, and you've gotta squash to get in! Is this somewhere people should stay? It's like jail!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Aarrrrgh!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: (Thump—)
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Haha.
Who is it?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Carry on. Bit more force, and you'll give this wall a new cubby-hole.
God, I couldn't have asked for anyone more dull to show up. Morgan, stop standin' out there if you can help it. Come in here and give us a scrap. Lemme get some relief.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't feel like it. Couldn't hit me if you wanted, but who knows how long it'd be before you're too worked up not to punch a wall again.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: And anyway, I'm not like you. Got plenty to do.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Tch. You and your sodding business. You couldn't pay me to figure it out. I know you just run around completely out of sight, anyway, exactly like you used to.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ay-yi-yi. I'm not gonna forget about you no matter how busy I am, Hannah, love~
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Heard you made a huge fuss at the training grounds. Got shooed out right after?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: ...You just came here to laugh at me, didn't ya?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk. You'll hurt me, talking like that.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You'd never believe if I was worried for you, so just treat it as me here on Vina's behalf, checking if you haven't made a right mess for her.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Her Majesty knows?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't work yourself up. I didn't tell on you.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But. We're aboard someone else's ship right now. Could you imagine whatever you do not reaching her ears somehow? Who do you think she is?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Tch, is it not enough to admit it's my fault this time?! I'll go find our Majesty myself.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Good, no rush. Been here a while now, anyway, so we know just how the people are at Rhodes, right? Vina's in an alright spot. None of us need to lose much sleep at night.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: ...Yeah, you're right, I get it.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: People here are fine, even. Not like the lot we used to see... too rotten, or too bloody weak.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: But that doesn't mean I've gotta like living like this. Hmph.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You say you don't like it. Still not used to it yet, are you?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I... tch. How'm I gonna get used to this?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Just, all of a sudden, don't need to play hide and seek every day. Won't be out of a place to sleep for nights on end. Don't need to worry when I sleep if anyone'll come to do us in.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Do miss those days a little. Even if you were dead asleep, eyes'd snap open the moment you heard something. Even throw a couple fists at the air.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: ...And who's the bastard who kept sneaking up? You see how generous I was, not giving you a black eye. Pulled my punches.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Haha, hahaha.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I mean, it's not just a good night's rest. You can always get something warm to eat here, and you don't need to worry if the bastard across you's gonna pull somethin' out an' mug you while you're chewing.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We left Londinium ages ago. When've we ever had it like this?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: One, two, three... I haven't seen any blood for a whole fortnight. Tell me somethin', Morgan, show me the light. How'm I gonna get used to this?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Listen to what comes out of your mouth. It's all proof Vina was right to bring us to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Rhodes Island can give us everything we need. And I don't just mean a bed and some food. And you've never had an interest in me talking about it, but you know it yourself, don't you?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Yeah. Don't need to know who my enemy is, just gotta know they're the enemy. I can tell who my real friends are, and who can be of use to Vina.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: And I still haven't forgotten what I came here with her for. I wanna see her draw her sword. For that day, I, Indra, will do whatever it takes.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: But... Morgan, in my dreams recently, I've been seeing all those kiddies we left behind.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I get it. You're actually worried about those bunch, aren't you?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Who'd worry for 'em?! You think I'm the bleedin' heart sort?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Honest?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I dunno...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That's the thing! I don't know anything!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I don't know how they're doing, if they got hurt, if they got sick, if... someone else's givin' 'em trouble. Especially all that lot.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I lie on this comfy, clean mattress, and I can't help but think, what about them? How are they doing, right now?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You understand those girls better than anyone. All these years we've gotten to know each other, like the backs of our own hands.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Like you could forget. We know better than anyone, living in Londinium since we were kids, how to make it out of each fight alive, don't we?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I believe in 'em.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: —Just like they always believed in me. Morgan, you remember too, right? Each one of them kept up with us, right behind our arses while they were still little.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ha, of course I remember. Right, and you kept behind my arse.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hey, no interruptions, yeah? Me behind you was 'cause you ran too fast. I was lookin' to kick you up there with the right opportunity.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Either way, back then... we swore an oath. Never mind if our days would ever be sunny—at the very least, no matter what, each person would have a share.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: And now... now... *sigh*.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't go sighing. We've followed Vina so far. Do you really regret it now?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Indra.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Do you understand the battle plans I just laid out?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: First half I'm clear as day, but the last bit... Vina, you didn't say where I head to after I'm done.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: For that part, I want you to choose for yourself.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You can come to this position, and meet up with me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You can also head for that position. They'll be waiting for you there around then.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And then you need to get moving with them quickly. Do whatever you need to after that. Don't come back here, and don't find me again.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina... do you...?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Yeah, I need to leave now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Is it the bunch from outside?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The dark clouds are getting closer. Surely you've sensed it too.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Tch. That bunch of bastards are sticky as the snot in my nose! I'll send 'em packing whether they're one or the lot.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: This isn't as simple as brawling for territory anymore. More and more are getting wounded. It won't be long before the situation's beyond what we can handle with our current strength.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We can't sit and wait to get killed. Before that... I need to seize the initiative.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Fine. Morgan said as much anyway.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: But—I'm not like her. I don't think about all that much rubbish. I just need you to tell me. Has this day come?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Yeah. This day has come.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're all in danger if I stay here. None of you would want to be cowards, and neither would I. But needless sacrifices disgust me more than that.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And besides, the struggle's never going to end, whether in Londinium or beyond. We'll always have things to do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Then I'll follow you! Wherever you are, I'll be. Long as there's a day you need my fist, I'll be with you!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Indra, you're my most trusted friend. I enjoy every battle we have side by side. But today, I want you to understand I'm not ordering you to go with me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Because I'm not certain myself when I'll be able to return here. If you decide to come with me, you won't be either. From here on, we'll be wandering somewhere different than before every day.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You can imagine all we'll face in future. You don't need me saying it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And besides... you're the first person I'd ask. After all, before I joined Glasgow, you were the head. I was thinking, maybe you'd be more willing to stay here for them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I told you, this isn't anything I even need to think about.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The moment I recognized you as my Master, my Majesty, I decided every day of mine right there.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Where you need to go, that's where I need to go. For you, my two hands will deal with your enemies, and hug your friends.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Today, if you want me to stay behind, I won't say a single word back. I'll stay behind for you.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: But if you're asking me—then you don't need to ask more than once.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I've only got one answer.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I believe in you, Vina, you're my liege!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Regrets... never. Not for all eternity.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Following Her Majesty's the most correct decision I've ever made in my life!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ay-yi-yi, you're gonna wake Vina up from the other end of the corridor, raising your voice that high.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hey, don't give me lip. Yesterday night she was thinking things over so late, she must be sleeping like a baby right now.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Alright, alright, you're alive enough that I don't need to keep chatting with you now.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Keep punching a hole in that wall. Make your way through, you can escape whenever you want, nah?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I bloody well... I...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You bastard, Morgan. They didn't write the word 'escape' in my dictionary!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Forget it. Tch.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Rhodes Island. My liege chose Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Then so do I.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...Doesn't change how crap of an eyesore being stuck in this room is!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Does my head in! Does my flippin' head in!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oi, who is it? You're not Morgan. Idiot would never learn how to knock.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It's—it's me, Operator Indra.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Pounded up like that and you can still stand straight? You're pretty good, tyke.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oh, you mean these wounds? Haha, I'm alright. The misses at Medical all helped treat them for me. When my dad used to take me training, sometimes I'd mess myself up just as bad too.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: So you're not here to get one over?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Uh, revenge? No, it's okay, these injuries you left were all from helping me train, right?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: You little tyke. I think I might like you.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Heheh, is that a compliment, Operator Indra? Then can I ask you to train with me next time too?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: You still wanna get whupped?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Just now in the medbay, I was thinking, your style—uh, not style, your fighting! Yeah, your fighting! Your fighting's really awesome, Operator Indra!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I could tell there was so much I'd never learned before, and I wanna learn it properly from you! Pleaaase!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: ...You wanna learn from me?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hey. You sure? I just beat you black and blue and you've still got the guts to hang around me?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Part of why I got beat's because I wasn't strong enough. That's not your fault.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Hah. People here really are nothin' like the ones outside.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That Perro with the whip...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Mm-hm, that's Miss Dobermann! She's our Instructor.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Don't matter what she's called! ...Tch, what's that look on your face for? Fine, I get it, Dobermann, okay.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That Dobermann? She said if I was prepared properly, I could go back.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: So let's give it a whirl and see.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Woah! You're really gonna do it? This rules!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Hah, too early to get happy. I don't do manners with my fists up.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: But... heh, learnin' from one another, eh. Just puttin' on some restraint, ain't it? Nothin' hard about that.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Givin' a rascal like you some pointers, that's all. Never been a problem for me!
attributes.name: Indra
